item.title: Kubernetes while redirection into a file
item.description: My first attemp to resolve "Kubernetes Time Check Pod" in https://engineer.kodekloud.com is not successful. The exercise doesn’t allow to open an editor to edit a yaml file. I had to resort to cat. I attempted several times to resolve it on my local cluster, still no luck even I tried different combination such as command, args,string in string, avoiding expansion. This one from stackoverfow gave me a clue how to resolve my issue.
